title: KC-GenRe: A Knowledge-constrained Generative Re-ranking Method Based on Large Language Models for Knowledge Graph Completion
abstract: arXiv:2403.17532v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: The goal of knowledge graph completion (KGC) is to predict missing facts among entities. Previous methods for KGC re-ranking are mostly built on non-generative language models to obtain the probability of each candidate. Recently, generative large language models (LLMs) have shown outstanding performance on several tasks such as information extraction and dialog systems. Leveraging them for KGC re-ranking is beneficial for leveraging the extensive pre-trained knowledge and powerful generative capabilities. However, it may encounter new problems when accomplishing the task, namely mismatch, misordering and omission. To this end, we introduce KC-GenRe, a knowledge-constrained generative re-ranking method based on LLMs for KGC. translated_abstract: 知识图完成（KGC）的目标是预测实体之间缺失的事实。先前的KGC重新排序方法大多建立在非生成式语言模型上，以获得每个候选的概率。最近，生成式大型语言模型（LLMs）在信息提取和对话系统等多个任务上表现出色。利用它们进行KGC重新排序有利于利用广泛预训练的知识和强大的生成能力。然而，在完成任务时可能会遇到新问题，即不匹配、错序和遗漏。为此，我们引入了KC-GenRe，一种基于LLMs的知识约束生成式重新排序方法，用于KGC。为了克服不匹配问题，我们将KGC重新排序任务构建为由生成式LLMs实施的候选标识符排序生成问题。为了解决错序问题，我们制定了一个受知识引导的...
tldr: KC-GenRe是一种基于大型语言模型的知识约束生成式重新排序方法，用于KGC，通过将KGC重新排序任务构建为候选标识符排序生成问题以及开发知识引导方法来解决重新排序过程中的不匹配和错序问题。
